item.title: Python Type Hints
item.description: The programming language I feel the most proficient and effective in is definitely Java, so I feel more at home with statically typed languages. Even though I really like Java and Spring Boot for large-scale web applications, Python is my go-to language for one-time-scripts, smaller apps and especially aws lambda functions I’ve been writing a lot more python recently, and I really liked a library called typing. typing is a standard library module which provides a runtime to support type hints.
